DataElement.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Personal Medical History Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the condition is considered part of the historical record of a subject, that is, it did not occur within the bounds of the study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Condition Performed Observation Outcome Personal Medical History Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine.:A state of being, such as a state of health.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine.:A state of being, such as a state of health.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the study or practice of medicine.
A state of being, such as a state of health.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader
Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
